_comment: Created by NCODowd on 24/05/2016 16:31:54 using v2.7
title: Have there been changes in support for community mental health service users?
analysis_commentary: The graph shows the proportion of people who use NHS mental health services who did not feel supported with various aspects of their lives. Physical health needs were the best supported, with the lowest proportion of patients reporting that they did not receive enough support (35% in 2015). Help with finding or keeping work was consistently the least supported area, with 47% of patients in 2015 reporting that they did not receive enough support. Performance worsened in all areas between 2014 and 2015.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
